newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - U.S. bank stocks seen as buys.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - U.S. bank stocks seen as buys.

text.p: -- Gerard Klauer Mattison analyst George Salem said he reiterated buys on seven U.S. bank stocks

-- Analyst says earnings will not suffer from rise in interest rates, most banks "would be helped, not hurt, by the latest and any additional rate increases." Analyst expects "solid first-quarter earnings," resumption of buybacks which could be catalysts for bank stock outperformance
-- Buy-rated stocks are Chase Manhattan Corp, Citicorp, Bank of New York Co Inc, BankAmerica Corp, Norwest Corp, Wells Fargo And Co and NationsBank Corp
